message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd be willing to meet you at $12500. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob! I can see you're serious about buying the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about we settle at $13500?
I'm really close to walking away from this deal, but I'm still interested in the product. I'd be willing to meet you at $13000. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $14000, Bob. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. What do you say?
